WorkItem.ClosedComment: Not something a character should really use
WorkItem.Description: So far i haven beeing appel add the 2% spell dmg reduction in to this effulgent skyflare diamond meta gem... thus makeing it look quit a lot better in the comparisment

Comments.Message: Having alot of trouble understanding you, but... That metagem doesn't actually work the way it sounds like; it actually increases your resistances by 2%. Some models don't support this in Rawr, but it's not high on our priorities to fix, since there's no situation where you should actually use that gem.
